text: Pen binɨb ogɨnap takaw agosɨpun anɨb ak gos ma nepal. Kɨli ned tap yepɨs agnepal okok gos nɨŋɨd kɨdek gelɨgɨpal. Anɨb ak tek, tap yɨpɨl binɨb ke ogɨnap sɨbogɨl pakɨpal anɨb okok, tap yepɨs agnepal okok tap kɨli ak. Pen tap yɨpɨl anɨb okok dɨl ñɨbebal won ak, chɨn God yɨl mɨdobun tek tap sɨbogɨl pakɨpal ak ñɨŋɨnɨgun agɨl, gos pal ak tɨmel won ak nɨg mɨdɨlɨg ñɨbebal.
